description: This package.json contains the dependencies for semantic-release and serving the docs

scripts.docs:dev: bun run docs:build && bun run docs:serve
scripts.regen-algod: cd rust_oas_generator && uv run python -m rust_oas_generator.generate_rust_client ../api/specs/algod.oas3.json --output-dir ../crates/algod_client/ --package-name algod_client
